Title: Relates to suspending of the collection and payment of sales tax by small businesses and local municipalities on purchases two hundred fifty dollars or less for a period of three months
Summary: Suspends the collection and payment of sales tax by small businesses and local municipalities on purchases of two hundred fifty dollars or less for a period of three months as a result of the negative impact of COVID-19.
ActClause: AN ACT in relation to suspending the collection and payment of sales tax on purchases of two hundred fifty dollars or less by small businesses and local municipalities for a period of three months as a result of the negative impact of COVID-19
